#### Presentations on Arima & Dovetail HiC protocols
The companies producing and validating the protocols and chemistries used in the course presented about their kits.

[Miles Collier, Dovetail, presents on AssemblyLink](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1EFBQyeFk5uq94SntI-anI1VTwSYPlKFR/view?usp=share_link)
The AssemblyLink protocol used in this course can be [found here](https://cantatabio.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Dovetail_AssemblyLink_Kit_User_Guide.pdf).

[Brian Kilburn, Arima, presents on the Arima HiC protocol](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1E57ejkNEqRFWoGNO95GaSNoCk0egz_ki/view?usp=share_link). The Arima HiC protocol used in this course can be [found here](https://arimagenomics.com/wp-content/files/User-Guide-Arima-HiC-for-Animal-Tissues.pdf).
